name: Foínix
description:
__About__

This is a 2d platformer about new beginnings, rebirth, and apples. Explore the world, collect things and if you die like a Phoenix from the ashes you begin again. Grow up, change and evolve as you learn new skills. The game has a day and night cycle also.

made in pico-8

___controls___ 

    arrow keys for movement 

   x to attack

 z/c/ up arrow to jump
